fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- At night, target someone {to Cleave, placing the first six sentences of their Role into curly braces}.
{- At night, once per game, you may remove the text in brackets of yourself and all players you Cleaved. If you cleave away their defense text, they are dealt an unstoppable attack. If this ability is Cleaved, the attack to all Cleaved targets does not go through.}

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Target 10 players {who have died due to being Cleaved by you}.
